**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 2.0 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- Mist fills the glass of this small circular hand mirror, creating strange patterns in the shifting gray wisps. The back of the mirror bears a flowing script engraving in an unknown language. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 23.
  • **Armor** After you cast an [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=629) spell by activating the mirror, choose one ally within 30 feet. That ally is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62), as if seen in a misty mirror, until the end of your next turn.
  • **Weapon** After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, illusory copies of the weapon swirl in the air around it. You’re affected by the [_thicket of knives_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1017) spell until the end of your next turn. The spell ends if you stop wielding the affixed weapon.
**Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You cast [_forbidding ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=126). Enigma Mirror **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 2.0 **Price** 325 gp --- **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_blur_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1455). Enigma Mirror (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 2.0 **Price** 950 gp --- The spell DC is 27. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_mirror's misfortune_](/Spells.aspx?ID=951). Enigma Mirror (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 2.0 **Price** 2,750 gp --- The spell DC is 30. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast _mirror's misfortune_. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_mirror malefactors_](/Spells.aspx?ID=950).
